model: Another great adventure with Faith McMann! Great characters and story! I couldn't put it down! Looking forward to reading more of this intense and suspenseful series! Full of twists and intrigue! What an amazing story! Great job!
people: Another great adventure with action packed suspense! A wonderful and insightful reading. We have to think this type of evil really happens, but sadly thus is far to common!

model: Another great adventure with Faith McMann! Fast paced and full of suspense! Great characters and plot! I couldn't put it down! Looking forward to reading more by T.R. Ragan!
people: Regan knows how to capture your heart and run with it! Such an amazing story! Looking forward to reading the next adventure!

model: Furious is an intense and intriguing read! Great characters and plot! I couldn't put it down! Looking forward to reading more of these stories! Faith is a strong and compelling protagonist! The themes of identity and reinvention are thoughtfully explored! Great job!
people: What a ride! I couldn't put it down! Can't wait to see what's next!Great story and characters! Keep it up! I've not read one bad story by Ragan!

model: Great characters and plot! Looking forward to more adventures with Jessie Cole. The mystery was intense and kept me guessing until the end. The town's secrets were revealed in a way that felt both shocking and necessary. A solid entry in the series!
people: Great characters and story. I always look forward to reading more of Regan her insightful characters are so well described.

model: Another great adventure with Noah Wolf! Fast-paced and full of suspense! I couldn't put it down! Great job with the plot and twist! Looking forward to more from this series!
people: You just can't keep Noah Wolf down! Such an intense and interesting plot. I was a wreck but to the very end! Great job!

model: Another great adventure with Jake Lassiter! Great characters and story! I couldn't put it down! Fast-paced and full of suspense and intrigue! Looking forward to reading more!
people: Loved the characters and the plot!  I could not put it down!  One of Coben's best!

model: Another great adventure with Jack Stone! Great characters and plot! Looking forward to reading more of these stories! Intense and action packed thriller! Great job!
people: What a great action packed thriller! Great characters and plot!  I was surprised at the ending again! Keep up the good work!

model: Looking forward to reading more by this author! What an interesting story full of suspense and intrigue! I loved the characters and thought good would never prevail! This is my first book by Reed but definitely not my last!
people: What a fast paced and suspense filled adventure! Great series! Looking forward to reading more about the Taylor family and plot!

model: Great job! On Her Father's Grave is a compelling mix of romance and suspense. Lila's determination to uncover the truth about her father is heartwarming. The mystery is well-paced and the characters are engaging. Ethan adds a nice balance of tension and romance. I couldn't put it down! Looking forward to more from Kendra Elliot!
people: I enjoyed the characters and plot! Looking forward to reading the next adventure for Stevie and Zane! I couldn't put it down!

model: Great characters and plot! Another thrilling adventure with Mercy Kilpatrick. Full of suspense and twists! Looking forward to more from this amazing series!
people: Once again Elliot gives us a surprise ending thatch did not see coming😐 I am so looking forward to reading more of these stories!
